Action:
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[DialogueActivity]( [Id] [uniqueidentifier] NOT NULL, [Timestamp] [datetime] NOT NULL, [Data] [nvarchar](max) NOT NULL, [Type] [nvarchar](50) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_DialogueActivity] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [Id] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) )
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[DialogueBadge]( [Id] [UNIQUEIDENTIFIER] NOT NULL, [Name] [NVARCHAR](50) NOT NULL, [Description] [NTEXT] NULL, [Type] [NVARCHAR](50) NOT NULL, [Image] [NVARCHAR](50) NULL, [DisplayName] [NVARCHAR](50) NOT NULL, [AwardsPoints] [INT] NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_DialogueBadge] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [Id] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) )
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[DialogueBadgeTypeTimeLastChecked]( [Id] [UNIQUEIDENTIFIER] NOT NULL, [MemberId] [INT] NOT NULL, [BadgeType] [NVARCHAR](50) NOT NULL, [TimeLastChecked] [DATETIME] NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_DialogueBadgeTypeTimeLastChecked] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [Id] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) )
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[DialogueBannedEmail]( [Id] [INT] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [Email] [NVARCHAR](200) NOT NULL, [DateAdded] [DATETIME] NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_BannedEmail] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [Id] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) )
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[DialogueBannedWord]( [Id] [INT] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [Word] [NVARCHAR](100) NOT NULL, [DateAdded] [DATETIME] NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_BannedWord] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [Id] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) )
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[DialogueCategoryNotification]( [Id] [UNIQUEIDENTIFIER] NOT NULL, [CategoryId] [INT] NOT NULL, [MemberId] [INT] NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_DialogueCategoryNotification] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [Id] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) )
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[DialogueCategoryPermission]( [Id] [UNIQUEIDENTIFIER] NOT NULL, [Permission_Id] [UNIQUEIDENTIFIER] NOT NULL, [MemberGroupId] [INT] NOT NULL, [CategoryId] [INT] NOT NULL, [IsTicked] [BIT] NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_CategoryPermissionForRole] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [Id] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) )
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[DialogueFavourite]( [Id] [INT] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [MemberId] [INT] NOT NULL, [PostId] [UNIQUEIDENTIFIER] NOT NULL, [TopicId] [UNIQUEIDENTIFIER] NOT NULL, [DateCreated] [DATETIME] NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_DialogueFavourite] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [Id] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) )
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[DialogueMember_Badge]( [Id] [INT] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [DialogueBadgeId] [UNIQUEIDENTIFIER] NOT NULL, [MemberId] [INT] NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_DialogueMember_Badge] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [Id] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) )
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[DialogueMemberPoints]( [Id] [UNIQUEIDENTIFIER] NOT NULL, [MemberId] [INT] NOT NULL, [Points] [INT] NOT NULL, [DateAdded] [DATETIME] NOT NULL, [RelatedPostId] [UNIQUEIDENTIFIER] NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_DialogueMembershipUser_Points] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [Id] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) )
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[DialoguePermission]( [Id] [UNIQUEIDENTIFIER] NOT NULL, [Name] [NVARCHAR](150) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_Permissions] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [Id] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) )
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[DialoguePoll]( [Id] [UNIQUEIDENTIFIER] NOT NULL, [IsClosed] [BIT] NOT NULL, [MemberId] [INT] NOT NULL, [DateCreated] [DATETIME] NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_DialoguePoll] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [Id] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) )
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[DialoguePollAnswer]( [Id] [UNIQUEIDENTIFIER] NOT NULL, [Answer] [NVARCHAR](600) NOT NULL, [DialoguePoll_Id] [UNIQUEIDENTIFIER] NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_DialoguePollAnswer] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [Id] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) )
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[DialoguePollVote]( [Id] [UNIQUEIDENTIFIER] NOT NULL, [MemberId] [INT] NOT NULL, [DialoguePollAnswer_Id] [UNIQUEIDENTIFIER] NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_PollVote] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [Id] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) )
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[DialoguePost]( [Id] [UNIQUEIDENTIFIER] NOT NULL, [MemberId] [INT] NOT NULL, [PostContent] [NVARCHAR](MAX) NOT NULL, [DateCreated] [DATETIME] NOT NULL, [VoteCount] [INT] NOT NULL, [DialogueTopic_Id] [UNIQUEIDENTIFIER] NOT NULL, [DateEdited] [DATETIME] NULL, [IsSolution] [BIT] NOT NULL, [IsTopicStarter] [BIT] NOT NULL, [FlaggedAsSpam] [BIT] NOT NULL, [IpAddress] [NVARCHAR](50) NULL, [Pending] [BIT] NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_DialoguePost] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [Id] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) )
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[DialoguePrivateMessage]( [Id] [uniqueidentifier] NOT NULL, [MemberToId] [int] NOT NULL, [MemberFromId] [int] NOT NULL, [DateSent] [datetime] NOT NULL, [Subject] [nvarchar](80) NOT NULL, [Message] [nvarchar](max) NOT NULL, [IsRead] [bit] NOT NULL, [IsSentMessage] [bit] NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_DialoguePrivateMessage] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [Id] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) )
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[DialogueTopic]( [Id] [uniqueidentifier] NOT NULL, [Name] [nvarchar](450) NOT NULL, [CreateDate] [datetime] NOT NULL, [MemberId] [int] NOT NULL, [Solved] [bit] NOT NULL, [CategoryId] [int] NOT NULL, [DialoguePost_Id] [uniqueidentifier] NULL, [Slug] [nvarchar](450) NOT NULL, [Views] [int] NOT NULL, [IsSticky] [bit] NOT NULL, [IsLocked] [bit] NOT NULL, [DialoguePoll_Id] [uniqueidentifier] NULL, [Pending] [bit] NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_DialogueTopic] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [Id] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) )
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[DialogueTopic] ADD CONSTRAINT [DF_DialogueTopic_Views] DEFAULT ((0)) FOR [Views]
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[DialogueTopicNotification]( [Id] [uniqueidentifier] NOT NULL, [DialogueTopic_Id] [uniqueidentifier] NOT NULL, [MemberId] [int] NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_[DialogueTopicNotification] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [Id] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) )
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[DialogueUploadedFile]( [Id] [uniqueidentifier] NOT NULL, [Filename] [nvarchar](200) NOT NULL, [MemberId] [int] NOT NULL, [DialoguePost_Id] [uniqueidentifier] NOT NULL, [DateCreated] [datetime] NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_DialogueUploadedFile] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [Id] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) )
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[DialogueVote]( [Id] [uniqueidentifier] NOT NULL, [MemberId] [int] NOT NULL, [DialoguePost_Id] [uniqueidentifier] NOT NULL, [Amount] [int] NOT NULL, [VotedByMemberId] [int] NOT NULL, [DateVoted] [datetime] NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_DialogueVote] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [Id] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) )
